title: annayE nin paadhamE
sahitya:
annaiyE nin pAdamE paNindEnE kannal tamizh isaiyin inimai nIdAnE endan 
(annaiyE)


anupallavi

munnavarum mUvarum tanda neRiDanai 
ennarum tavappayan enRE uNarndEnE endan  
(annaiyE)
             

caraNam

manida kulam sezhikka mAmarundinaiyE 
unadiru vizhi pozhiyum aruL oLitanilE

madyama kAlam

tannilai tanai maRandE 
tanadenum nilai maRandE 
unnait tudikka mAsugaL maRaindu 
unnada nilai pera innisai tanda en 
(annaiyE)
